Review_Text: A very attractive and interesting documentary in a comedic presentation.It gives an example of how some of the politicians in Sweden passed laws that screwed up the school system and teachers lives as well as students so that they make money afterwards.I recommend it watching it for those living in Sweden.
Do not understand what the purpose of this series is, parody, comedy, fact or... ? Who is the target audience? Audience is addressed as all are children... very confusing!
